amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 116-383 to clarify Federal law for reporting certain positive consumer credit information to CRAs, and seeks to expand access to credit through use of alternative data.
amendment.purpose: Amendment clarifies the Federal law for reporting certain positive consumer credit information to Credit Reporting Agecies (CRA), and seeks to expand access to credit through use of alternative data.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Clay amendment Agreed to by recorded vote: 231 - 185 (Roll no. 28).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Clay.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Clay amendment Agreed to by recorded vote: 231 - 185 (Roll no. 28).
